Hi.

Although this is most likely clear, one could add to the following descriptions of <Directory> and <DirectoryMatch>, that not only the directory itself and its sub-directories, but also all the (regular) files contained in these are matched, or better said accesses to these.

- http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/sections.html#file-and-web (in the "Filesystem Containers" section)
- http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/core.html#directory
- http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/mod/core.html#directorymatch

Cheers,
Chris.
